text: Porfirio Armando Betancourt Carranza (10 October 1957 â€“ 28 July 2021) was a Honduran professional footballer. From 1982 until 1985, he made nine appearances for the national team. Betancourt died on 28 July 2021 in San Pedro Sula, Honduras from problems caused by COVID-19, aged 63. ==References== ==Other websites== * MISL stats Category:1957 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Honduran footballers Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic
title: Porfirio Armando Betancourt
